column4: Had an excellent talk with President @GotabayaR.  Sri Lanka is fighting COVID-19 effectively under his leadership. India will continue to support our close maritime neighbour in dealing with the pandemic and its economic impact.

COVID 19 Update May 22: The most dangerous current effect of the pandemic may be denial.

Denial this was bad. Denial it has killed significant number of people. Denial it might come back even stronger.

Most of all, denial that social distancing actions had a big impact.1/

Meeting of the 22 like minded Political Parties begins virtually to dicuss Covid-19 & economic pandemic.

Meeting condoles the deaths caused by Amphan Cyclon in West Bengal & Orissa. 

Smt. Sonia Gandhi delivers her opening remarks.

I just remembered, just at the beginning of the pandemic in India, I mean after we accepted it was a health emergency, various cities hosted Gaumootra parties. For youngsters and foreigners Gau is cow and Mootra is Urine. Yeah people drank Urine in those parties to defeat CORONA.

After creating chaos in MP now the BJP in Maha are trying to destabilize the govt despite the ongoing pandemic. 

BJP is indulging itself in dramatic politics to settle political score, while the Maha Govt is working tirelessly to fight against #Covid_19.

The tension along Line of Actual Control nothwithstanding, India is doubling down on infrastructure building in border areas. All roads and tunneling projects in border areas will be resumed in the next few days. They had been scaled down because the Covid-19 pandemic
One thing the COVID-19 pandemic should teach us is that universal healthcare and paid sick leave are necessary to the security of our economy.

There are a number of urgent actions that need to be prioritised by this Govt and next to help people survive and get back on their feet during and after the #Covid19 pandemic. Targeting those on ‚Ç¨350 a week is not one of them.

Shiv Sena leader Aditya T shud not speak abt lows n world records..becz of his spineless chief minster..Maharashtra has the highest Corona numbers of all times!! Getting compared to New York now.. have some shame n do some real work n save us from this pandemic!!!

The COVID19 pandemic shows we need a better medical model and educational model to deal with the stress of our new technology and its disruption of the organic basis of life. Yoga, Ayurveda and Vedanta can provide the wisdom and practical methods to do this.

The United States' threats to intercept 5 Iranian tankers bringing aid to #Venezuela are an act of war that violates international laws. During this #COVID19 #pandemic, I support international solidarity and the #GlobalCeasefire.

CM Uddhav Balasaheb Thackeray today held a video conference with the BMC's hospitals, deans, medical officers and doctors. 

He expressed that there is no doubt that they will be the architects of this victory once the Corona pandemic is over.

#ICYMI

Watch @Winnie_Byanyima and other feminist leaders discuss how to meaningfully include women and girls in the global response to #COVID19, and how to ensure reproductive and sexual health justice during the pandemic.

When we overcome this #COVID19 pandemic, we must build back better. More equal and inclusive societies, with better living and working conditions for everyone. #WeAreAllInThisTogether, we need to go through it together.

Delivery timelines will depend on the aviation services amidst pandemic #Covid19 

Booking for other Int‚Äôl Parcel n Letters remain suspended.

Modi‚Äôs callous indifference towards India‚Äôs poor during the COVID-19 pandemic rises to the level of democide.

I just watched video of a starving migrant worker eating the carcass of a dead dog on a highway.

@realDonaldTrump Many Americans have loved ones in nursing homes and fear for their safety, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic. For Trump to talk about a ‚Äúnursing home victim‚Äù without specifying further makes many people anxious. For what? Mystery and suspense? This is not a reality TV show.

No China GDP growth target this year, Li: ‚ÄòWe have not set a specific target for economic growth this year, this is because our country faces some factors that are difficult to predict.... due to great uncertainty regarding COVID-19 pandemic'

On the last Friday of #ramadankareem I wish all my Muslim brothers Alvida Jumma as we near the end of #Ramadan. I urge all of you to offer prayers at home and avoid public gatherings and stay safe during this #Covid_19 pandemic.

It's difficult to measure the true impact of the #COVID19 pandemic. Looking at excess deaths‚Äîthe number of people who died above usual rates‚Äîis an increasingly common and powerful way to capture the virus's true toll.

.@mayawiley discusses the issues within the prison system being highlighted by the coronavirus pandemic:

"The Bureau of Prisons, just like the Trump administration denied the seriousness of COVID-19."

My father just penned a Limerick for the @ChristChurchVic newsletter. I thought it was quite good:

A pair named Bonnie and Dix
Had a pandemic to fix
They said keep apart
And have a kind heart
But try not to socially mix

#covid19 #bcpoli

Also big NPC news: #China has no GDP target for this year at all. Premier Li said Chinese economy in 2020 "difficult to predict in its development due to the great uncertainty regarding the #covid19 pandemic and the world economic and trade environment". Actually understandable.

Over 34,000 nursing home residents have died from #COVID19. This pandemic disproportionately impacts nursing homes, but we are trying to help residents and workers with one hand tied behind our backs because the Administration is not releasing any data on these outbreaks.

Pained by reports of loss of life and property caused by Cyclone Amphan in West Bengal and Odisha. It is a doubly precarious situation when these states as well as the rest of the country are also battling the COVID-19 pandemic.

I've not commented on this whole COVID-19 pandemic. But when you see people go sunbathing with 100's of other people at the beach and you havent seen your family or friends for 2 months, Closed your business and dont know when you can work again, that is taking the piss. End of.

Fear of #COVID19 mixed with existing discrimination and violence for returned migrant children in Central America and Mexico is leaving them doubly at risk.

Deportation of children must stop during the pandemic, especially if they are unaccompanied. #AChildIsAChild

Good call with @SE_Rajoelina, President of #Madagascar, about the #COVID19 situation in his country. We discussed how to work together on therapeutics research and development. And we agreed that solidarity is key to fighting the pandemic and keeping the world safe.

20,000 deaths by Covid-19 in Brazil. Two health ministers left the job since the pandemic began. No health minister for a week. The caretaker is a general who has no experience in health care ‚Äî his patch is logistics. President said yesterday the general will stay on for a while.

Children must be able to seek help even during a crisis.

Join us for a webinar tomorrow at 9 a.m. EST to learn about the increased risks children are facing during the #COVID19 pandemic and how we can keep them safe. #ENDviolence

The pandemic continues to reveal that there is an amazing number of public health experts out there on Twitter. Average Twitter follower count: seems to be about a dozen or so. And some right wing columnists turn out to be public health experts. Who knew? #COVID19

We asked our neighbors in uniform to serve our nation in its time of need, and we hope the Department has not‚Äîand will not‚Äînickel-and-dime its Soldiers and Airmen. 

Their service is key as they can continue to assist with the nation‚Äôs fight against the #COVID19 pandemic.

The Senate Judiciary Committee *should* be addressing issues like #COVID19 outbreaks among police officers and within our prison system, the availability of sufficient PPE for first responders, and numerous other issues related to the pandemic.

column3: Authorised by A Tudge, Liberal Party, Wantirna South, Victoria
